Table of Contents

Interface IUserPreferencesRepository

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Repositories
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Repository interface for managing user preferences (UserPreferences entities). Provides strongly-typed and key-based access to user-specific settings with default value fallback.

public interface IUserPreferencesRepository : IRepository<UserPreferences>
Inherited Members
IRepository<UserPreferences>.GetAllAsync(CancellationToken)

IRepository<UserPreferences>.DeleteAsync(UserPreferences, CancellationToken)
IRepository<UserPreferences>.DeleteByIdAsync(int, CancellationToken)

IRepository<UserPreferences>.DeleteAllAsync(CancellationToken)

Remarks

This repository abstracts storage and retrieval of user preferences, supporting: - Key-based lookup and update - Strongly-typed getters (string, bool, int) with safe defaults - Reset to default values - Categorized/grouped retrieval for UI or bulk operations

Implementations must ensure: - Case-insensitive or normalized key comparison - Efficient single-key lookups (indexed on Key column) - Safe handling of missing keys (return defaults instead of null/exceptions) - Atomic updates to avoid partial writes

Retrieves all preferences grouped by category.

Returns

Task<Dictionary<string, List<UserPreferences>>>

Dictionary where key is category name and value is list of preferences in that category.

The preference key.
